participant_1.background:
I like to do spontaneous things on the weekend, like go for walks in the woods at midnight.
i like to drink at bars with friends.
I enjoy a cheeseburger once in a while, but I make sure to get in my daily exercise to stay fit.
I had to sell my motorcycle to pay for my car.
i am fluent in spanish.

participant_2.background:
I waste my time watching YouTube videos instead of working.
My laundry takes a backseat to my many projects.
i love to clean my house.
I live in the suburbs because it is a quiet place where I can relax and enjoy my family and friends.
My family is very supportive of my sleep schedule and my need for exercise.

content.text: hello! how is your day going?
It's going okay! I'm trying to finish up a project at work, but I'm having some trouble focusing.
ah i see, what kind of project?
It's a website redesign. I'm trying to figure out how to make it look more modern and user-friendly.
ooh that sounds interesting! i'm not very good at website design but i'm sure you'll do a great job
Thanks! I hope so. I've been working on it for a while now, and I'm starting to get a little tired of it.
ah i know the feeling. well i'm sure it will be worth it in the end!
Hopefully! What are you up to today?
not much, just hanging out at home. i'm thinking about going for a walk in the woods later.
That sounds nice! I love going for walks in the woods.
yeah me too, it's so peaceful and relaxing.
I wish I could go with you!
you can! i'm always up for company
Cool! I'll message you later and we can figure out a time to go.
